```{r setup}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(ape)
library(rotl)
library(remotes)
library(datelife)


```

```{r}
Rxresistance <- read.csv(file = "../data-raw/metadata.csv")
head(Rxresistance)
colnames(Rxresistance)
rownames(Rxresistance)
na.omit(Rxresistance)
```

```{r}
dna_seqs <- Rxresistance$Sequence

library(Biostrings)
# Create DNAStringSet object
seqs <- DNAStringSet(dna_seqs)

# Calculate distance matrix
dist_matrix <- dist.dna(seqs)

# Build tree using maximum likelihood
tree <- pml(dist_matrix, model="HKY85")

# Visualize tree
plot(tree)

```
